Hawke’s Bay’s ‘miserable weather’ drags Splash Planet summer visitor numbers down https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/hawkes-bays-miserable-weather-drags-splash-planet-summer-visitor-numbers-down/T4FPQZ2NMBH3XEP2FLE37CF2OI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/hawkes-bays-miserable-weather-drags-splash-planet-summer-visitor-numbers-down/T4FPQZ2NMBH3XEP2FLE37CF2OI/ Linda HallSplash Planet's visitor numbers are so far more than 12,000 down on last summer. Wed, 15 Jan 2025 00:50:51 +0000 Splash Planet is among the outdoor pools in Hawke's Bay taking a hit in visitor numbers, with the past week's temperatures 6C lower than normal, according to MetService. Photo / Warren Buckland

Warning over eating dead snapper washed up on Auckland beaches after trawler sinks in Hauraki Gulf https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/warning-over-eating-dead-snapper-washed-up-on-auckland-beaches-after-trawler-sinks-in-hauraki-gulf/D7WAHHDPAFFG3FYAAUHXT4EZ74/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/warning-over-eating-dead-snapper-washed-up-on-auckland-beaches-after-trawler-sinks-in-hauraki-gulf/D7WAHHDPAFFG3FYAAUHXT4EZ74/ Ben TomsettThe sunken fishing vessel was carrying crates of snapper. Police observe national minute of silence for slain Senior Sergeant Lyn Fleming ahead of Thursday funeral https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/national-minute-of-silence-for-slain-policewoman-lyn-fleming-ahead-of-thursday-funeral/YIAGANUDZREP5HWCWB6VP2BWUE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/national-minute-of-silence-for-slain-policewoman-lyn-fleming-ahead-of-thursday-funeral/YIAGANUDZREP5HWCWB6VP2BWUE/ Raphael FranksSenior Sergeant Fleming, 62, was killed when she was rammed by a car on New Year's Day. Wed, 15 Jan 2025 00:08:49 +0000 Police officers and staff gathered in front of the Wellington police station for a minute’s silence in honour of their fallen Nelson colleague Lyn Fleming.
